response.original_title: I Didn't Come Here to Make Love
response.overview: Juliet Lightbourne wants to write a novel about women in America while her B list literary manager pushes her to write for TV and to stay away from 'rusty dusty literature.' She surrounds herself with her odd ball group of millennials.
response.tagline: An aspiring novelist, desperately trying to write for a generation that no longer reads novels, is catapulted into the love stories of her friends, in a city where love has a price.
response.title: I Didn't Come Here to Make Love
